name: warp_points
description:
Transform a list of (x, y) points from original image space into warped arena space, using arena calibration and settings.

Output: A list of (x, y) points in the rectified warped coordinate system.

Example: `warp_points(points=[[320, 240], [400, 300]])`

points.description: List of [x, y] coordinates to transform into warped space.

data_folder.description: Path to the folder containing `arena_corners.txt`. Defaults to 'Data'.

settings_path.description: Path to the JSON file with arena warp dimensions. Defaults to 'Settings/settings.json'.

name: unwarp_points
description:
Transform a list of (x, y) points from warped arena space back to original image space, using arena calibration and settings.

Output: A list of (x, y) points mapped to original image coordinates.

Example: `unwarp_points(points=[[100, 100], [200, 200]])`

points.description: List of [x, y] coordinates in warped space to transform back to original arena space.

data_folder.description: Path to the folder containing `arena_corners.txt`. Defaults to 'Data'.

settings_path.description: Path to the JSON file with arena warp dimensions. Defaults to 'Settings/settings.json'.
